name: Chinatown Chaos (Bznboy)
description:
Originally made for Brackey's Game Jam on 22nd August 2021.

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-6

There is an evil syndicate that has been extorting the locals for money. You are one of the victims who have found an opportunity to make them regret it!

Lure the bull around the syndicate street! Deal as much property damage as you can to make their operations unsubstainable!

The bull see reds and charges at you, make sure you avoid it!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash
